definition: to turn off (a machine or device)/to finish shooting a film
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: Switch off your phone and allow messages to go to voicemail.
sentences.chinese: 将你手机关机，让信息转到语音信箱。

sentences.english: Turn off electronic devices you're not using.
sentences.chinese: 不用电子装置时就关机吧。

sentences.english: Never shut down you mobile, in case of I am sick , I need you take me to hosipital , stay with me.
sentences.chinese: 唔好关机，万一半夜我有事要去急症室我想你陪住我。

sentences.english: Any overshoot at turn on or turn off shall be less than 10% of rated output voltage.
sentences.chinese: 开机或关机时，电压过冲不得超过标称值的10%。

sentences.english: Safe, dependable shutdown systems fit a range of engines and fuel injection pump governors.
sentences.chinese: 安全，可靠的关机系统适合各种发动机和喷油泵省长。

sentences.english: This is no longer the shadow, mobile phone shutdown, who knows where.
sentences.chinese: 二哥早没了影，手机关机，谁也不知去了哪儿。

sentences.english: A thread is allocated to handle shutdown events.
sentences.chinese: 一个线程被分配为处理关机事件。

sentences.english: Turn off the phone, hold down VOL DOWN and POWER, just like you normally would to install a leak.
sentences.chinese: 关机，按住音量下及电源键，亦如君日常安装泄版。

sentences.english: I logged on at 7 o'clock and logged off at 12 o'clock.
The product is automatically powered off when no signal is detected longer than 8 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 该产品设定为检测不到信号时会在8秒后自动关机。

sentences.english: Sorrry, the subscriber you dial is power off, please dial later.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，您拨的用户已关机，请稍候再拨。

sentences.english: During this interval, no shutdown activity occurs.
sentences.chinese: 在这个时间间隔内，不会出现关机操作。

sentences.english: Its screen can be turned off with the touch of a button without turning off the computer itself.
sentences.chinese: 轻点一个按键就可以关掉屏幕，无需关机。

sentences.english: Machines can also undergo a controlled shutdown.
sentences.chinese: 机器也可以在控制下进行关机。

sentences.english: With the alarm clock to remind function, automatic shutdown.
sentences.chinese: 具有闹钟提醒功能，自动关机功能。

sentences.english: Secretly to call non Haidong Lin, but found the shutdown.
sentences.chinese: 海东偷偷给林非打电话，却发现关机。

definition: (of a machine) to stop/to shut down/to park a plane/to finish shooting (a TV program etc)/to suspend a phone line/(of a prepaid mobile phone) to be out of credit
to start an engine/to boot up (a computer)/to press Ctrl-Alt-Delete/to begin shooting a film or TV show

incoming telegram or telephone call/your telegram, telephone call, or message/to send a telegram or make a telephone call here (i.e. to the speaker)/to have instant attraction to sb/to have chemistry with sb/to come back (of electricity, after an outage)
to reject/to refuse to take a call
